q1.title: What is the purpose of this app?
q1.content: This app was designed to help users track their daily habits and stay productive. It offers features such as customisable habit tracking, goal setting, progress visualisation, and reminders to keep you on track.

q2.title: How do I create a new habit?
q2.content: To create a new habit, click the "Add Habit" button on the dashboard. Enter the habit name, set your target frequency (daily, weekly, etc.), choose a time, and optionally add reminders.

q3.title: Is my data secure?
q3.content: Yes, your data is fully encrypted and stored securely. We use industry-standard encryption protocols to protect your personal information.

card1.title: Portfolio UI Components
card1.body: I established design foundations in Figma — spacing scales, primitives, and semantic tokens — and implemented a multi‑brand token system. Using Figma MCP and Claude AI in VS Code, I rebuilt those foundations in code to create a robust, 1:1 design system that keeps design and code synchronized while producing accessible, reusable components.

about.tagline: Design specialist with expertise in enterprise delivery, design systems, and accessibility.

bupa.title: Design System Designer @ Bupa
bupa.description: Part of the Design System team, building and optimising digital components that power customer-facing web and app experiences across Bupa APAC.
bupa.resp1: Maintain a cohesive digital experience across all design system patterns and components.
bupa.resp2: Define usability and accessibility standards, ensuring best practices are applied throughout the design process.
bupa.resp3: Partner closely with front-end developers to translate designs into code, prioritising simplicity, performance, and quality.
bupa.resp4: Use analytics and user insights to continuously improve design system performance and customer outcomes.

bupaSecondment.title: Experience Designer (Secondment) @ Bupa
bupaSecondment.description: Seconded to support a key enterprise initiative, working as an experience designer on Blua, a new mobile health app.
bupaSecondment.resp1: Design end-to-end onboarding, health data sync, and account access experiences for the new mobile app.
bupaSecondment.resp2: Collaborate with international engineering teams to successfully launch the app across the APAC region.
bupaSecondment.resp3: Work with Content, Brand, and Marketing teams on App Store and Play Store submissions.
bupaSecondment.resp4: Partner with the Native Design System team to identify and design reusable components.

ctm.title: Product Designer (Design System) @ Compare the Market
ctm.description: Led the creation of Mecha, Compare the Market's design system, from the ground up. The system is now live across the main website and Pet Insurance product, serving as a foundation for all future products.
ctm.resp1: Built a comprehensive design system covering typography, colour palette, iconography, and design principles.
ctm.resp2: Applied UX/UI best practices from Apple HIG, Material Design, and WCAG to ensure high-quality components.
ctm.resp3: Worked with cross-functional teams to integrate the design system into development workflows, improving iteration speed and reducing design debt.
ctm.resp4: Conducted usability testing to validate concepts before implementation.

etrainu.title: eLearning Designer/Developer @ etrainu
etrainu.description: Created accessible eLearning modules for a platform serving over 1,000 clients, using Chameleon, Articulate 360, VS Code, and the Adobe suite.
etrainu.resp1: Built responsive learning experiences across web, mobile, and tablet devices.
etrainu.resp2: Designed and programmed interactive elements to maximise learner engagement.
etrainu.resp3: Created marketing and promotional materials for course launches.
etrainu.resp4: Debugged and maintained HTML code across new and existing modules.

hyphen.title: UI/UX Developer @ Studio Hyphen IO
hyphen.description: Worked at a digital agency handling projects from design through to development, using WordPress, Bootstrap, PHP, and Figma.
hyphen.resp1: Delivered UX, UI, and front-end development across digital platforms.
hyphen.resp2: Improved visual design consistency across web and mobile assets.
hyphen.resp3: Designed and developed email campaigns in Figma and tested them in Mailchimp.
